text: Private registries are so *helpful* and *easy* in our private gitlab instance compared to trying to share python packages.

elements.text: in our private gitlab instance compared to trying to share python packages.

text: Gitlab now has an integrated PyPI registry support.

elements.text: Gitlab now has an integrated PyPI registry support.

text: Good to know! But, alas, we are self-hosted and stuck with 12.x because 13 abandons support for NFS. The upgrade will be a big headache and will be put off for a long long time.

elements.text: Good to know! But, alas, we are self-hosted and stuck with 12.x because 13 abandons support for NFS. The upgrade will be a big headache and will be put off for a long long time.

text: I’ve been quite happy with being able to use private registries, plus the new ability to have multiple packages in different subdirectories of a single git repo (new in Julia v1.5)

elements.text: I’ve been quite happy with being able to use private registries, plus the new ability to have multiple packages in different subdirectories of a single git repo (new in Julia v1.5)
